dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YYYY') created_date, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.number_with_japan_tsc(cv.charter_voyage_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT') || j.job_xid ref_num, REPLACE(srem1.remark_text,'|',CHR(13)) commodity, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT (CASE WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'LB' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'KG' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'TON' THEN (SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MTON' OR ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MT' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 1000 ELSE SUM(ssu.received_weight) END) tot_weight FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 GROUP BY ssu.received_weight_uom), '999,999,990.00')) || ' KG' weight, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fullname(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') manager_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_email(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') manager_email, sref1.shipment_refnum_value place_of_receipt, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid,'SHIPMENT','SCOULAR/NVO.VIA_LOCATION_ID',cv.source_location_gid) load_port, s.attribute2 hs_code, cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value cut_date, cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value cut_time, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'XXX',cv.source_location_gid,'CITY') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'XXX',cv.source_location_gid,'COUNTRY')) origin, (CASE WHEN sref3.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN sref4.shipment_refnum_value ELSE sref3.shipment_refnum_value END) vessel_name, cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value voyage_number, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_ship_char_loc(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_PORT OF DISCHARGE',cv.charter_voyage_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid) discharge_port, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_PLACE OF DELIVERY',cv.dest_location_gid) place_of_delivery, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(TO_NUMBER(charter_voyage_refnum_value)) FROM charter_voyage_refnum WHERE charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND (charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%20%COUNT%' OR charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%TEU%COUNT%' OR charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%40%COUNT%' OR charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%45%COUNT%')), '999,999,990')) || ' Containers' quantity, NVL((SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'ITN'), 'Data Missing in System') AS aes_number, sref2.shipment_refnum_value special_instructions, (SELECT LISTAGG(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(se.s_equipment_gid),'99990')) || ' X ' || (CASE WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22GP' THEN '20FT' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22PL' THEN '20FT FLATRACK' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22RE' THEN '20FT RF' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22TG' THEN '20FT ISO TANK' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22UT' THEN '20FT OPEN TOP' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_29PO' THEN '20FT PLATFORM' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_42GP' THEN '40FT' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_42PL' THEN '40FT FLATRACK' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_42UT' THEN '40FT OPEN TOP' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_45GP' THEN '40FT HC' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_45RE' THEN '40FT HCRF' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '45FT_L5GP' THEN '45FT HC' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid LIKE '%RO RO%' THEN 'RORO' ELSE eg.equipment_group_xid END), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY eg.equipment_group_xid) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment se ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = se.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN equipment_group eg ON se.equipment_group_gid = eg.equipment_group_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid GROUP BY eg.equipment_group_xid) container_count, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (ssur.remark_text) FROM s_ship_unit_remark ssur INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.DESCRIPTION OF CARGO OVERRIDE') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ssu_y_n FROM shipment s INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON s.shipment_gid = vsor.shipment_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON vsor.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid INNER JOIN job j ON jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC_CUTOFF_TIME_HHMM' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_PLACE OF RECEIPT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING INSTRUCTIONS' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.BOOKING_VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_DESCRIPTION OF CARGO' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(cv.charter_voyage_xid, 'Data Missing in System') booking_number, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YYYY') created_date, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.number_with_japan_tsc(cv.charter_voyage_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT') || NVL(j.job_xid, ' Data Missing in System') ref_num, NVL(REPLACE(srem1.remark_text,'|',CHR(13)), 'Data Missing in System') commodity, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT (CASE WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'LB' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'KG' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'TON' THEN (SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MTON' OR ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MT' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 1000 ELSE SUM(ssu.received_weight) END) tot_weight FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 GROUP BY ssu.received_weight_uom), '999,999,990.00')), 'Data Missing in System') || ' KG' weight, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fullname(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') manager_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_email(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') manager_email, NVL(sref1.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') place_of_receipt, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc(s.shipment_gid,cv.charter_voyage_gid, 'SHIPMENT', 'SCOULAR/NVO.VIA_LOCATION_ID', cv.source_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') load_port, NVL(s.attribute2, 'Data Missing in System') hs_code, NVL(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') cut_date, NVL(cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') cut_time, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') sail_date, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'XXX',cv.source_location_gid,'CITY') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'XXX',cv.source_location_gid,'COUNTRY')), 'Data Missing in System') origin, NVL((CASE WHEN sref3.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN sref4.shipment_refnum_value ELSE sref3.shipment_refnum_value END), 'Data Missing in System') vessel_name, NVL(cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') voyage_number, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_ship_char_loc(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_PORT OF DISCHARGE',cv.charter_voyage_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') discharge_port, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_PLACE OF DELIVERY',cv.dest_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') place_of_delivery, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(TO_NUMBER(charter_voyage_refnum_value)) FROM charter_voyage_refnum WHERE charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND (charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%20%COUNT%' OR charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%TEU%COUNT%' OR charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%40%COUNT%' OR charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%45%COUNT%')), '999,999,990')), 'Data Missing in System') || ' Containers' quantity, NVL((SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'ITN'), 'Data Missing in System') aes_number, NVL(sref2.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') special_instructions, NVL((SELECT LISTAGG(TRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(se.s_equipment_gid),'99990')) || ' X ' || (CASE WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22GP' THEN '20FT' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22PL' THEN '20FT FLATRACK' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22RE' THEN '20FT RF' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22TG' THEN '20FT ISO TANK' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_22UT' THEN '20FT OPEN TOP' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '20FT_29PO' THEN '20FT PLATFORM' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_42GP' THEN '40FT' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_42PL' THEN '40FT FLATRACK' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_42UT' THEN '40FT OPEN TOP' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_45GP' THEN '40FT HC' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '40FT_45RE' THEN '40FT HCRF' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid = '45FT_L5GP' THEN '45FT HC' WHEN eg.equipment_group_xid LIKE '%RO RO%' THEN 'RORO' ELSE eg.equipment_group_xid END), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY eg.equipment_group_xid) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment se ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = se.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN equipment_group eg ON se.equipment_group_gid = eg.equipment_group_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid GROUP BY eg.equipment_group_xid), 'Data Missing in System') container_count, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (ssur.remark_text) FROM s_ship_unit_remark ssur INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.DESCRIPTION OF CARGO OVERRIDE') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ssu_y_n FROM shipment s INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON s.shipment_gid = vsor.shipment_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON vsor.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid INNER JOIN job j ON jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC_CUTOFF_TIME_HHMM' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_PLACE OF RECEIPT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPPING INSTRUCTIONS' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref4 ON s.shipment_gid = sref4.shipment_gid AND sref4.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.BOOKING_VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_DESCRIPTION OF CARGO' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM((CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MBL_SHIPPER_LINE1') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN loc.country_code3_gid = 'IND' THEN 'TSC CREST SOUTH ASIA PVT. LTD.' || CHR(13) || '31 Airforce Road' || CHR(13) || 'Bhagat KI Kothi Jodhpur' || CHR(13) || 'Jodhpur India' ELSE (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_NAME','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_NAME','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ADD2','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','2') IS NULL THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ADD1','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','1') ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ADD1','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ADD2','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','2')) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ADD2','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','2') IS NULL THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ADD1','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','1'), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ADD1','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ADD2','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','2')), 'Data Missing in System') END) END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_CITY','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_PRVNC','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ZIP','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_CNTRY','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER')) ELSE NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_CITY','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_PRVNC','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_ZIP','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_CNTRY','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER')), 'Data Missing in System') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_PHONE','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','TEL:') ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_PHONE','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','TEL:'), 'Data Missing in System') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_FAX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','FAX:') ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_SHPPR_FAX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER','FAX:'), 'Data Missing in System') END) END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MBL_SHIPPER_LINE1'),CHR(13) || CHR(13),CHR(13)) END)) shipper_name, TRIM((CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MBL_NP_LINE1') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_NAME','XXX') ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_NAME','XXX'), 'Data Missing in System') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ADD2','XXX','2') IS NULL THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ADD1','XXX','1') ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ADD1','XXX','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ADD2','XXX','2')) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ADD2','XXX','2') IS NULL THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ADD1','XXX','1'), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ADD1','XXX','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ADD2','XXX','2')), 'Data Missing in System') END) END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_CITY','XXX',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_PRVNC','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ZIP','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_CNTRY','XXX')) ELSE NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_CITY','XXX',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_PRVNC','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_ZIP','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_CNTRY','XXX')), 'Data Missing in System') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_PHONE','XXX','TEL:') ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_PHONE','XXX','TEL:'), 'Data Missing in System') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_FAX','XXX','FAX:') ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MB_NP_FAX','XXX','FAX:'), 'Data Missing in System') END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MBL_NP_LINE1'), CHR(13) || CHR(13), CHR(13)) END)) notify_name, TRIM((CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MBL_ANP_LINE1') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN '' ELSE 'Data Missing in System' END) ELSE (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MBL_ANP_LINE1') ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.MBL_ANP_LINE1'),'Data Missing in System') END) END)) also_notify_name FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON s.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((CASE WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'LB' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'KG' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'TON' THEN (SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MTON' OR ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MT' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 1000 ELSE SUM(ssu.received_weight) END),2), '999,999,990')) || ' KGS' ELSE NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((CASE WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'LB' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'KG' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'TON' THEN (SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MTON' OR ssu.received_weight_uom = 'MT' THEN SUM(ssu.received_weight) * 1000 ELSE SUM(ssu.received_weight) END),2), '999,999,990')), 'Data Missing in System') || ' KGS' END) total_weight FROM shipment s JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID GROUP BY ssu.received_weight_uom

SELECT a.s_ship_unit_gid, (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN a.container_num ELSE a.container_num || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN CHR(13) || :SEAL_PREFIX || ' ' || (CASE WHEN a.attribute1 = 'YES' THEN 'AGENT SEAL ' ELSE '' END) || NVL(a.seal_num1,'Data Missing in System') ELSE (CASE WHEN NOT a.seal_num1 IS NULL THEN CHR(13) || :SEAL_PREFIX || ' ' || (CASE WHEN a.attribute1 = 'YES' THEN 'AGENT SEAL ' ELSE '' END) || a.seal_num1 END) END) || (CASE WHEN NOT a.seal_num2 IS NULL THEN CHR(13) || :SEAL_PREFIX || ' ' || (CASE WHEN a.attribute1 = 'YES' THEN 'CUSTOMS SEAL ' ELSE '' END) || a.seal_num2 END) || (CASE WHEN NOT a.seal_num3 IS NULL THEN CHR(13) || :SEAL_PREFIX || ' ' || a.seal_num3 END) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN CHR(13) || NVL(a.marks_numbers,'Data Missing in System') ELSE (CASE WHEN NOT a.marks_numbers IS NULL THEN CHR(13) || a.marks_numbers END) END) || (CASE WHEN :SHOW_PIECES = 'YES' THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(a.piece_cnt || ' ' || a.piece_typ),'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'XXYYZZYYXX' THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE TRIM(a.piece_cnt || ' ' || (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(regexp_replace(a.piece_cnt,'^.*?(\d+)\.doc$','\1')) > 1 THEN (SELECT pt.plural_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.piece_typ) ELSE (SELECT pt.singular_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.piece_typ) END)) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN NOT TRIM(a.piece_cnt || ' ' || a.piece_typ) IS NULL THEN CHR(13) || TRIM(a.piece_cnt || ' ' || (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(regexp_replace(a.piece_cnt,'^.*?(\d+)\.doc$','\1')) > 1 THEN (SELECT pt.plural_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.piece_typ) ELSE (SELECT pt.singular_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.piece_typ) END)) END) END) END) || (CASE WHEN :SHOW_WEIGHT = 'YES' THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN CHR(13) || NVL(TRIM(a.received_weight || ' ' || a.received_weight_uom),'Data Missing in System') ELSE (CASE WHEN NOT a.received_weight IS NULL THEN CHR(13) || a.received_weight || ' ' || a.received_weight_uom END) END) END) || (CASE WHEN :SHOW_WEIGHT = 'YES' THEN (CASE WHEN :SHOW_NT_WT = 'YES' THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN CHR(13) || NVL(TRIM(a.unit_net_weight || ' ' || a.unit_net_weight_uom_code),'Data Missing in System') || ' NET' ELSE (CASE WHEN NOT a.unit_net_weight IS NULL THEN CHR(13) || a.unit_net_weight || ' ' || a.unit_net_weight_uom_code || ' NET' END) END) END) END) END) || CHR(13) || CHR(13) container_num, (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN '' ELSE (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(a.short_desc,'Data Missing in System') || CHR(13) || CHR(13) || CHR(13) || CHR(13) ELSE a.short_desc || CHR(13) || CHR(13) || CHR(13) || CHR(13) END) END) short_desc FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN 'See Attached Rider for Container Info' ELSE ssu.tag_3 END) container_num, ssu.tag_1 seal_num1, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2') seal_num2, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 3') seal_num3, s.attribute1, ssur1.refnum_value piece_cnt, ssur2.refnum_value piece_typ, ssur3.refnum_value received_weight, ssur4.refnum_value received_weight_uom, ssur5.refnum_value unit_net_weight, ssur6.refnum_value unit_net_weight_uom_code, ssur7.refnum_value marks_numbers, (SELECT ssur.remark_text FROM s_ship_unit_remark ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.DESCRIPTION OF CARGO OVERRIDE') short_desc FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON sh.shipment_gid = vsor.shipment_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON vsor.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur3 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur3.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur3.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_GROSS_WEIGHT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur4 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur4.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur4.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_GROSS_WEIGHT_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur5 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur5.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur5.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_NET_WEIGHT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur6 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur6.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur6.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.CONTAINER_NET_WEIGHT_UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur7 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur7.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur7.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MARKS AND NUMBERS' WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND (:RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' AND ROWNUM = 1 OR :RIDER_NORIDER = 'NO-RIDER') ORDER BY ssu.s_ship_unit_gid ASC) a

SELECT LISTAGG( (CASE WHEN :SUM_PIECES = 'YES' THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.counter), '999,999,990') || ' ' || (CASE WHEN SUM(a.counter) > 1 THEN (SELECT pt.plural_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.p_type) ELSE (SELECT pt.singular_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.p_type) END)) ELSE '' END),', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.p_type) piece_count FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, TO_NUMBER(regexp_replace(ssur1.refnum_value,'^.*?(\d+)\.doc$','\1')) counter, TRIM(ssur2.refnum_value) p_type FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON sh.shipment_gid = vsor.shipment_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON vsor.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'B') INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID) a GROUP BY a.p_type

SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN '' ELSE (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(ssu.received_weight,'999,999,990.00')),'Data Missing in System') ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(ssu.received_weight,'999,999,990.00')) END) END) unit_weight, (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN '' ELSE (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(ssu.received_weight_uom,'Data Missing in System') ELSE ssu.received_weight_uom END) END) measurement, (CASE WHEN :PRINT_NT_WT = 'YES' THEN (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN '' ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(ssu.unit_net_weight,'999,999,990.00')) END) END) net_weight, (CASE WHEN :PRINT_NT_WT = 'YES' THEN (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN '' ELSE ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code END) END) net_measurement, (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN '' ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(ssu.received_volume,'999,999,990.00')) END) unit_volume, (CASE WHEN :RIDER_NORIDER = 'RIDER' THEN '' ELSE ssu.received_volume_uom END) volume_uom FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON sh.shipment_gid = vsor.shipment_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON vsor.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID ORDER BY ssu.s_ship_unit_gid ASC
